original_text: And because he loved thy fathers, therefore he chose their seed after them, and brought thee out in his sight with his mighty power out of Egypt;
korean_text: 여호와께서 네 조상들을 사랑하신 고로 그 후손인 너를 택하시고 큰 권능으로 친히 인도하여 애굽에서 나오게 하시며

sentences.original_text: And because he loved thy fathers,
therefore he chose their seed after them,
and brought thee out in his sight
with his mighty power out of Egypt;
